content.detailedDescription: Ok i was sitting in my back porch with a friend around 3am smoking a cig. then all of a sudden he notices a "star" way brighter then the others that were up in the sky. so we watched it for awhile and it seemed very put. no movements what so-ever, then all of a sudden around 3:30am or so, the "star" dimmmed very fast then brightened again but this time it seemed to be blinking rapidly. now see, im very sensitive when it comes to things like this. i was in shocked for at first, i thought it was nothing then we both saw the lights, we knew we had something here. the "star" then after ten mins or so of the blinking, it started to move very slowly, but the thing we both notice was how it swayed from side to side, almost before every time it was going to move. now by that time  i instantaneously busted out in tears and my legs started to shake. i was very afraid, nervous, shocked, excited almost every felling you can think of. so after a hour or so of constant focus on this object, which has in the time span of 3:30-4:40 this "star" has ascended, descended, swayed and even looked like it zig-zagged in a falling motion but would stop and float back into a stationary postion.Another thing that chaught me off guard was that every timed it swayed there seemed almost like there were others things reacting to this star. for example, the first time we notice the movements or swaying of this "star' there was alot of shooting stars more then i have seen in one night and then there was a orange "ufo" the appeared to the left of it almost same altitude as our "star", but this object moved in a constant slow hover to the left and simply just dimmed away. so it is around 5am now and im blown away now and my friend was very tired, so he had decided to hit the hay and i would stay and watch some more. i was so drawn to watch this i couldn't let it go. so i stayed out for another hour but what i noticed as i was out was around the sky there was more of them the the left and right but what almost seemmed miles away from eatch other, but they all seemed to be doing the same motion. they would sway and then drop very slowly then stop and sway and float back up.After seeing this i panicked and went back inside and in the room to sleep. so yea this is what i saw and well im was blown away really. i always keep my eye in the sky but this, lets just say i was not ready for this at all. i only wish there were more people to have witness this. this would have smacked people in the face with the truth. wish i captured some footage but im to broke for a camera or anythng at that matter but i know what i saw. and i felt you guys do to.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: There was only one bright one but small orange spread across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to get to sleep one night, staring out my bedroom window, when suddenly i saw a bright light shining through the trees. i didn't know what it could be, so i got up to see what it was. suddenly, a triangle craft flew over the trees and my house. it was moving slowly, so i was able to watch it for about 2 minutes before it disappeared from sight. it was flying lower than most aircraft. it had a bright white light on each cornor and a pulsing (not blinking) red light in the center. it made no noise and didn't emit any exhaust. i don't know what it was, but my belief in the supernormal was comfirmed when i saw it.
content.summary: A triangle craft with a bright white light on each cornor and a pulsating red light in the center.

content.detailedDescription: A row of 4 or more glistening star like lights took a slight right hand turn.The lights completely went out with a slightly red after glow as it made its way behind cloud cover .I can tell you this was no airplain i have 2 other witnesses that saw it at the same time i did.
content.summary: A row of glistening lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south bound on us1 north miami beach florida just north of the intersection of biscayne and 163rd street. notice objects to my right. took 2 pictures with iphone. in first picture 4 objects. in second picture 3 objects. total 7 objects.
fog moving in from left (east). other vehicles in the picture. other lights. railroad crossings.
objects moved quickly southbound and vanished.

i usually am observant. trained to look at my surroundings. single engine pilot since 8/1970.
content.summary: Four ufo's paralleled to road way

content.detailedDescription: I saw a golden object come toward my house, it was really moving fast, it them took a fast move to the right, and up. it was really moving like something was chasing it. then it was gone. i have been watching objects like this for the past two night. different times.The dogs were barking too.
content.summary: Watched an object come toward our house,then shifted to my right and moved very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my girlfriends computer with my headphones on when she ran in the house tapping my shoulder then running back out saying telling me to come outside and to hurry, and then there it was. a giant orange sphere that kinda pulsated before it went out. i ran in the house to grab the camera but by the time i came back it had vanished. i have seen ufo's before and i'm pretty sure that what i was viewing was not man made. 

from her side of the event. she was outside smoking when a giant orange light streaked across at a downward angle with a jet like roar. at first she thought it was a meteor coming to kill us all until it stopped in its tracks starting to fade away. she then ran inside to grab me.
content.summary: Orange light streaks across then hovers in lake elsinore ca 12/1/2011

content.detailedDescription: There are times when i see them all over the mountians of ojai ca. north of ojai rose valley seems to me there is a base  deep in middle lions camp were iv seen strange lights on the ground on a mountian
content.summary: Been seeing ufos liveing in the mountians of ojai ca.Sence then

content.detailedDescription:
I am a police officer and was on duty the night of november the 27th in lee's summit, missouri.  i was at the intersection if 291 highway and 150 hwy when i noticed a round object with very bright white lights to my west.  it would take a baseball held at arm's length to cover the object. the white lights had a blue hue to them and all of the lights were on the bottom of the craft.  the lights were strobing, and there was no sound whatsoever.  it was a clear night with no cloud cover, and the oject was very low, just above treetop level.  i watched as it hovered, and filmed it with the dash cam on my patrol car for approximately 15 minutes, then finally turned the camera off because i didn't want to use up memory on the camera.  i called dispatch, who got a good laugh out of it, but they wouldn't take me seriously.  i requested a copy of the video when i arrived at the station and will forward that to mufon when i get it. the object then moved to the west slowly at first, then sped up very quickly and was out of sight in a couple of seconds.  i stopped at quick trip and several families came up to me and asked if i saw the ufo. i assumed that they would call in a report, but according to dispatch there were no other reports received. i am disturbed that something like this was not taken more seriously by my supervisor and looked into.  i searched the internet and found missouri mufon, and decided to file an official report. i am a former marine, have been a police officer for six years, and have never seen anything like this before.  i am familiar with conventional aircraft, and this was not any type of normal aircraft. 
i saw a similar object on october 31 in the same location but did not file a report about it.  this object was closer than the other one. i called another officer to come out and he saw the object, too. we both want to remain anonymous at this time. i am interested in helping investigate ufos in this area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Round object with lights hovered over field then flew away very fast

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting my first ufo sighting.  at this time i was five years old.  the weather was cool and crisp, so it was either early spring, or late fall of 1980, unfortunately i do not recall which one.  the event occurred just west of i-435 on e 55th st in kansas city, missouri.  my mother and i were in a chair under a blanket before bed time looking at the stars.  on the same piece of property on it's north line is the far end of brush creek.  here the creek is tree lined.  we were sitting there and suddenly, without have noticed anything previous a bright white orb appeared.  even at that age i noticed that it was very odd in the respect that although bright, it did not cast light on the trees and ground around it.  the orb was larger than aspirin sized but smaller than a dime.  this orb remained lit for nearly a minute.  the light then went out.  without seeing any dark object, a few seconds later the orb reappeared 30-50 feet right of the position it had been previously.  this time the orb appeared a deep dark crimson red, again casting no light.  the orb remained lit for approximately the same amount of time it did originally.  the light then went out and nothing more was seen of it.  i remember discussing it with my mother, on how odd it was, and that it couldn't have been a helicopter as it made no noise at all.  to this day, and in the past, my mother has no recollection of this event.  my mother and i lived with my grandmother at this home.  she was home, and inside at the time.  i remember my mother and i telling my grandmother what we had seen.  she too has never had any recollection of this event.
content.summary: Glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: While driving back home for christmas break from san diego to hollister ca, i stopped on a piece of property we own in a very secluded part of an unpopulated area to start a fire and get some rest before continuing north. around 4 am i noticed an orb straight above a hill that hadn't been there before and it moved in a light circular pattern. i knew right away it was too bright to be a star but wasn't making a sound so it couldn't be a helicopter. i grabbed my i-phone and hoped it'd be able to catch it. luckily it was the only object in the sky bright enough even though there where planets and thousands of stars out. after taking a couple short videos i became a bit uncomfortable being miles from the nearest human and out of cell distance for at least an hour. i got in my car and drove to the gate to lock it and leave but then when i got out from my car i saw the orb moving from the hill towards me, so i jumped in my car and left the gate open. i drove to the nearest house and parked outside but didn't want to alarm anyone at the easy risk of sounding like a crazy person. so i waited there knowing if anything happened i could honk my horn. i took a couple more videos of the orb which had followed me and soon decided to drive further to the next place i knew people lived and there was a land line. it followed me miles down the road where i stopped again. i took some more videos and felt a little less scared now. i had rationalized that if it was going to hurt me it would have already done it. i remembered that i needed to lock the gate so i reluctantly went back to lock it and the orb followed me back. day was starting to break and i had drained the battery on my phone from all the videos but the orb continued to be visible during early morning after all stars disappeared. after i locked the gate i continued to drive home and look back every now and then but i lost the orb in the morning fog and never saw it again. as soon as i got home i told my parents even though i new it sounded crazy, i just felt i had to tell someone. they believed me because they knew i wouldn't lie about something like this. i'm a pretty skeptical person myself so i showed the videos to them and a couple friends. they didnt come out as good as i thought they would because the movement of the object was hard to see with my hand shaking and also on the i-phone the object appeared much smaller and less bright than in real life. i thought about reporting the sighting right away but didn't like the fact that already i was getting skeptical feed back from my friends and decided to stop telling people about it or showing the videos. but after hearing from many of the neighbors in that area, some very credible, that they had seen similar orbs, i decided to make this report.
content.summary: A hovering orb appeared over me while camping in a very secluded part of our county. it moved in a  slight circular pattern when stationed and continued to follow me for miles after i left my camp in fear.

content.detailedDescription:
on thursday, december 01, 2011 at approximately 1350 hours, i was driving near the intersection of n. figarden loop near the european grove in northwest fresno. in my periphery, i noticed a white sliver in the sky. i thought it was an airplane. i looked again but didn't see it. there were trees all around so i assumed it was an airplane flying beyond the trees. i was wrong. i stared into the sky and saw nothing. my lady didn't see anything either. then, it presented itself in the open sky. i was glad my lady witnessed it too because it's hard to articulate.

   it made no sound and seemed to hover above the city at an elevation slightly higher than airplanes. based on what i saw,  i estimate  it to be about the size of about  two football fields. it first appeared as a  white cigar shape then it disappeared.  about  ten seconds later,  it appeared again in the same location, but illuminated. i pulled out my smartphone to film it but before i could,  it disappeared and was never seen again. i am also curious if anyone else saw this thing.
content.summary: White cigar shape hovering high above ne fresno then disappeared. reappeared illuminated then vanished before i could film it on my phone.

content.detailedDescription:
1 in field 
2 dead silence foggy felt hollow and light
3 a couple of blimps
4 came out of no were.Hovered above us for 20 minutes
5 remembering more as time goes on
panic attacks started within weeks after.Foggy memory.Feeling of unease now

6 silently moved straight forward into fog and rain into meadowlands swamp and feilds
content.summary: Appeared overhead on top of us.Loss of memory.Panic ever since.As time goes on memory comes clearer.T

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from work i notice in the north east sky just above the tree line very bright lights, as bright as venus would be in the sky. i only saw it shortly since i was driving, but it looked like a pair of lights almost on top of each other similar to what headlights look like from a distance. it/they did not appear to be moving at all. i lost it behind trees as i drove.
content.summary: Double star like object

content.detailedDescription: I notice the glowing flashing white light silver disc shape hovering about 200 ft on westminster and magnolia at 6:40 pm when i stoped at a traffic light.  the object was moving slowly north toward anaheim, ca.  the silver matallic bright disc was moving slowly.  you can see that it a silver metallic disc because it only 200 ft high with red flashing light.  this is not the first time i seen a ufo.  i saw a larger disc shape ufo back in july 2005 in westminster, ca.  it was about 500 ft high hovering for 10 minutes.  there was rotating light around the disc like red, white, blue, green, and orange.  there was a bright light in the middle of the large ufo.  again 2 helicopter move toward this large object and it just took off in a second toward seal beach, ca.  i have no interest in ufo therefore it doesn't amaze me much.  my only reaction is observe the object and tell my husband about it since he is the one that had an encountered with the third kind when he was a child.  as i pulled into my community i seen the object heading toward seal beach, ca.  there is a naval base for submarine at seal beach about 10 mile from us and i sure there is nuclear weapon underground there since my friend used to work at the naval base and that is what he told me.  the helicopter was still circulating around garden grove for at least 10 minuters or so when i saw the ufo head toward seal beach.  if anyone that was out in the street at 6:40 pm that night in wesminster would seen the ufo since it flying so slow and low.  i cannot take any picture because my 2 little boy was sitting in the back and my cell phone is in the back as well.  sorry.
content.summary: Move about 20 mph from westminster to garden grove to long beach.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside my back door appox 7:15pm. noticed a strait line of red-orange pulsating spheres traveling from the west to east. they moved slower than an airplane would. the lights did not blink like a plane.. no white lights at all. i ran to the front of the house to see how they traveled and counted 8 and there may have been more.. i ran to the front door to get my daughter so she could witness. by the time she came out she only saw about 4 of them. they just traveled until out of view. it was truly the strangest thing that either one of us have ever witnessed. i am 55 and have been around watching stars and planes at night for a long time and have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: 8-10 red orange pulsating spheres traveled in strait line above tree line approx 1mi away. just traveled until out of sight. my daughter also witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were heading home from lincoln traveling east-southeast on nebraska highway 2. my brother says he looked over towards the southwest and saw a larger than normal light blink off. at first he thought he had caught a reflection of headlights off of the windshield but as he continued to watch he saw another light blink on followed by the first light blinking on again. he got my attention and i wanted to view the lights without worrying about driving off the road so i pulled onto the nearest gravel road and started heading south. the two lights were equidistant from each other and seemed to be drifting north-northwest slowly. we noticed three planes nearby, we could easily see their wing lights blinking in the sky. as we followed the country road south, first one light dimmed and then pulsed out then the other one. so we turned around and followed the gravel road back to the highway. we had no more than turned back onto highway 2 (again headed southeast) when my brother shouted that the lights were back and brighter this time. so we again turned onto the next nearest road headed south. this time the lights were positioned further east of where they had been before. just like before the lights would dim then brighten before they finally dimmed completely and then blinked out. once again we turned around and headed back for highway 2. we were back on highway 2 just past palmyra when once again the lights appeared and this time there were three bright yellowish orange lights that formed a boomerang shape. we watched for about three minutes as the outside lights would perform the brighten and dim pattern they had been doing previously while the center light stayed on and never dimmed or pulsed. after about three minutes the light on the left side dimmed quickly and went out, closely followed by the right one. the center light stayed on for about 30 more seconds before it too dimmed and went out. we did not see the lights again even though we continued to look for them for about 20 minutes.
content.summary: Possible boomerang shaped object in southeast nebraska

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was driving to my mothers house in blue springs on 7 highway, i was at a stop light, near winsteads and jack in the box.  my son who is 18 looked off to his right and pointed and said all excited "what is that"  i turned to looked and it was floating over our truck, it made no noise and there was so many bright lights, it just slowly floated over our truck, i looked straight up into it and seen a round disk like shape through all the lights, but the lights were blinding, it flew across 7 highway, and then on down the street and changed directions.  it was so large and had so many lights, i have never seen anything like it before, it had to have been from another planet!
content.summary: Ufo floated over the top of our truck, very bright lights, no noise at all, just floated by our car, and across the road.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on november 30th at around 6:44 p.M. along i270 headed south towards georgesville rd.  in between the bridge of sullivant and georgesville road something caught my attention.  as i looked i noticed three orange colored lights in the far distance, guessing maybe 10 miles away as the lights from my distance appeared to be very small.  as i watched, i noticed 3 additional lights apear with all lights appearing to be equal distance apart from one another.  the lights lite up in sequential order with the first light appearing and staying lite while each additional light lite up.  the sighting reminded me of the sighting over phoneix arizona several years ago.  it almost appeared as though the lights were lighting up the outline of a large disk shaped object.  the object(s) seemed to be just hovering in place. the night was clear but the lights only lasted for maybe 10 seconds then all six lights just blinked out all at once.  i would guess from my view point the object(s) may have been over the grove city, obetz, or circleville area.
content.summary: 6 orange orbs of light that appeared to light up in sequential order south of columbus ohio

content.detailedDescription:
Entered my upstairs bedroom to go to sleep and a bright light was in my eyes.Thinking it was the moon i went to the window to close blinds and observed it was not the moon but an object in the sky and smaller than the moon but much larger than a helicopter search light.


so bright it illuminated by room like a full moon. after stationery 2 minutes three red lights appeared in triangular formation and object appeared to rotate 2.5 times to the north with plane of triangle perpendicular to the ground.  after rotating it suddenly vanished.  clear night no clouds.

i was so astonished.  it was real not an effect or something ambiguous.  very tangible. very clear cut. i was stunned that i was actually witnessing this thing.
content.summary: Bright white ight 1/4 size of move stationary 2 minutes then three red lights appeared in triangular formation rotated 2.5 times then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was at church camp, kirmont, near bellfountaine, ohio in about august of 1968.  on our last night, a clear starry night, about 120 youth and counsellors were having a worship service on a hilltop at around 9 p.M.  we all saw this triangular craft with purple and green lights glide across the sky, not directly overhead, but at about a 45 degree angle.  no one discussed what we saw other than to say, "oh wow, did you see that?"  it has never left me.  bellfountaine is about an hour by car from wright patterson afb.
content.summary: Object slowly crossed the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the topps supermarket in the village of hilton, ny at about 5:05pm when a bright distant object in the south western sky got my attention.  although likely several miles away, i noticed it looked like a pair of white lights, with one being slightly smaller and a bit dimmer than the other, but in tandem, or in very close proximity to each other.  i observed it for about a minute and it remained stationary in the sky and the lights did not flash like any aircraft, but remained a constant brightness of white light.  my impression was that it looked like i could make out the shape somewhat of a triangle, with one light larger and brighter than the other. it was too far away to be sure... i returned to my car to drive home, which is less than a mile away (a 2 minute drive), where i thought i might be able to get a better look through some binoculars, or possibly try to get a picture of it.  when leaving the supermarket, i was able to see it through my drivers side car window up until i reached the road that i had to turn onto to get back home (route 259 southbound). it remained stationary the entire time. once i turned onto my street (sherwood drive), i lost site of it. when i got home i had a clear line of sight to the area in the sky that the object was seen, but it was no longer there.  i did see a aircraft at a much higher elevation passing above the area at 5:10pm.
content.summary: Bright double light was stationary in south western sky for 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Glowed for 5 seconds and went out like a light switch.
content.summary: Large bright light just above tree line, went dark and reappeared several miles closer,  larger, and brighter.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were on vacation for fourth of july at the river.I remember i was barbecuing facing south when something in my head told me to look up when i did there was amber colered ball of light that kind of was moving side to side i alerted my family and relatives to what was in the sky there was 5 adults and 5 chidren who witnessed along withmyself as for anybody else surrounding us i dont know.The ball was stationary as we all observed it get real bright then disapear for about 1 to 2 seconds then reapeared as triangle shape with 3 lights got bright again disapeared again  i said where did it go and it reapeared same triangle shape but the thing was it went from east to west in amatter of seconds.Almost like it jumped, it showed it self for a bit then disapeared then what looked like two stars about a football field apart were seen zipping from west to east in a fast speed till they disapeared and me and my fam were left in amazement to what we witnessed and im glad i could report it somewhere.
content.summary: Triangle lights sighting .

content.detailedDescription: In wv was taking pics of planes in the sky; saw weird spots in photos; first photo attached, the ufo is toward the top left side of the photo; second photo attached, the ufo is located in the bottom right side of the photo as two white dots; have to zoom in to see both well; didnt see with naked eye
content.summary: Pics show something weird

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside at night, clearing my head since i had been at my inlaw's house and i needed a break. i entered a farmer's field, and started down my walk. after a while, i was the only one in a long while away. then it happened. i noticed something out of the corner of my eye and i saw a strange light in the sky. at first, i thought it was a star, or a satillite, but then it became multicolored and grew in size. it emitted a low hum sound, and it rapidly came toward me. the whole night seemed to go silent as it hovered over me, and then accelerated again. i watched as it beamed a light down towards my inlaw's house. confused, i began to walk back, and decided that i was just crazy. but after some time, i realized that i had actually seen it.
content.summary: It emitted a single beam of light, and flew straight towards me before stopping to hover.  (happened at night) i found my chickens were dead.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were traveling east towards lititz pa when we saw what we though was a hot air balloon in the distance. when we looked closer it was not but was the shape of a balloon on top of another. it was light dull grey in appearance. we continued to watch from our car for a few minutes while driving. it was hovering and stationary. i than pulled over and parked my car to watch and it was gone. there was a steam trail straight up into the sky. like what would be behind a jet. the trail went straight up until we couldn't see the end of it. 
we continued about what we were doing and later when we were leaving our destination approximately 5:00 we were traveling north and spotted lights in the sky the same shape as what the object was. when returning home we saw 2 of these lights. one to the se and one to the west of our front porch. it was than dark and they appeared as stars. but shaped differently. 
i continue to keep my eye on them. about 7:00 i went outside with binoculars to see them better. the object to the west of me started to move sideways rapidly. i called my 14 yr old son out and he watched with me. the object was gone in a few seconds. i watched the one to the se of us. it appeared to move west at a very slow rate. by morning they were gone.
i did send another report seeing the same objects on 11-31-11
content.summary: Grey balloon shaped object

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i went for a walk in the night to look at the stars and chat. we were gazing up into the sky when wee both noticed what looked exactly like a star but it was moving. my friend remarked that it could possibly be a satellite. we continued to watch it moving at a moderate speed and then suddenly changed course (path like a sharp angled l). we were both stumped by this, we both thought it impossible for a satellite to change course. after that it simply disappeared. the details are sketchy in my memory, as this happened quite a few years ago. i cannot recall whether it was blinking or not, but imagine that it did. all i remember feeling was suprise.
content.summary: A friend and i saw what looked like a star, but it was moving. after a short distance it changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: My whole life i seen these white orbs that fly silent and manuver unlike anything that our technology can do. for  the last 4 months not only myself but on many occasions this has been witnessed by many of my friends and family.These sightings have been occurring around the so.St.Louis and so. co. areas.I have no ajenda and nothing to hide. these are real! this last sighting lasted approx. 1-2 min. the orb traveled north to south very slow and flew kinda like a drunk driver with no sound it then seemed to stop and it just vanished. my nephew and his girlfriend live with me and they see it almost daily also. is anyone elese seeing this? i will be ready next time and will take pictures and video.
content.summary: A white circle of light  moving unlike anything earthly.

content.detailedDescription: Awake in bed and heard a hum outside. then 10 minutes later heard another hum. i got up and went to my bathroom window on the north side of my condo to look outside. i saw two round objects that appeared connected together, side by side and were moving from east to west and upward at a 75 degree angle until they disappeared, it only took about 10 seconds. the outside of the objects looked like they were covered in various colored bright crystals. also there was one white light beam going downward from the objects that was well defined, not difuesed like a flashlight would be. the light went from bright at the object to less bright as it went down. the whole extent of light pulsated in brightness but did not change shape. i went back to bed and just layed there until i got up for work.
content.summary: Two lights going up in sky

content.detailedDescription:
About 40 years ago when i was about 14 (can't remember exactly) my mother & i were driving home from my grandfather's house in scranton. it was early evening in summertime just after dark. we were on the scranton expressway heading east when we saw cars bumper to bumper pulled over.  then we saw three objects hovering low approximately 300 yards from the highway.  traffic slowed to a crawl watching these objects.  they were golden in color and had some kind of appendage sticking out what i assume to be the front.  we were totally awe struck by what we saw. there was no room to pull over so we kept going.  i never observed the objects do anything but hover.

when we got home we assumed it would be covered on the local news. it wasn't.  i thought it would surely be covered in the scranton times newspaper.  i searched the paper for days afterward but there was never any mention of it.  there had to be at least fifty witnesses but i have never found anything more about it.

this event stuck with my mother and i for a long time.  my mother would sometimes look for objects in the night sky.  

in 1974 there was a ufo "hoax" nearby in carbondale, pa.  i quote hoax because my mother believed there was probably something to the story but was covered up.  my mother was not the kind of person to believe in elaborate government conspiracies or anything but she truly believed, based on our experience there is something to the ufo phenomenon. 

over the years i put it out of my mind almost afraid to talk about it.  i figured people would either think i'm crazy or a liar.  things are different now.  i have a lot of company.

i have tried to find out more about what i saw but can't.  i thought if i posted my account maybe someone else who was there that night might see it and add details i can no longer remember.
content.summary: 3  objects hovering low near the scranton expressway about 1970
